resources.string: Search for a Pokemon by name or using its National Pokedex number
You can now only do a precise search by name or id, such as 1 or bulbasaur, and get bulbasaur. To use fuzzy search, download the database.
You can now do a fuzzy search using a name or id, such as 1 or bul, and get bulbasaur.
